Body: Description: We have a DFS server that is in the "ALL WINDOWS SERVERS (NO DCS)" host group, which is being used by the file system jobs, but have no data.

What We've Learned Updated: •	What is the impact of the issue on your business? 
	Logging/Monitoring not present for large amount of files.  Unable to look into security issues if they arise.
•	Who is affected by this issue? 
	IS Dept
•	What steps to troubleshoot the issue have already been taken?
	Verified StealthAudit is able to communicate with server
•	Is this a new configuration, data collection or report?
	Server is new, but not anything else
•	When did this issue start?  
	Unknown, server was added to environment a few months ago.

It would take 24+ hours for all the jobs to complete that include this server.  I would like to take a look with someone before that time frame.  I have uploaded the existing logs from the last run with ERROR level.

Steps to Reproduce Updated: Current understanding is the the needed job was pointed a the wrong host and was not able to correctly populate the data.
